bindColumns(android.database.Cursor).Description: Called once when the associated @B_android#database#Cursor_E@ is changed. A subclass should bind column indexes to column names in this method. This method is not intended to be called outside of CursorMapper.

convert(android.database.Cursor).Description: Convert a @B_android#database#Cursor_E@ at its current position to an Object.

bind(android.database.Cursor).Description: A subclass should implement this method to create a single object using binding information. This method is not intended to be called outside of CursorMapper.

ClassDesc: Abstract class used to convert the current https:##developer#android#com@B_android#database#Cursor_E@ row to a single object.
